title: Excellent stay at Taj Samudra
review: Great location with a great view no matter what room you have. Excellent amenities and overall great staff and service. Shashika & her Housekeeping team were amazing and always responsive to anything I needed. The location is very close to many places and plenty to do and see. will definitely return my next time in Colombo

name: Niluni Perera
title: Supereb
review: Nice hotel . Very good service. From the check in until the check out every thing is perfect. Maintain the standard as it is. Reception is perfect. All the covid privantion methods strictly follow. We will meet up

name: gayathries2014
title: Function at taj
review: We had a fiction at taj last month and the support We got was amazing. Special thanks to Dinusha chef shamila and Onella. The food was amazing and the service was unexplainable. All the best. And thank u again

name: Geethika J
title: Honeymoon at Taj Samudra
review: We stayed at Taj Samudra for our honeymoon for two days and it was a great experience. Check in procedure and the cleanliness of the room was excellent. They always served us the highest quality foods. The Ports of Call staff did their best when serving the foods. All of the staff members were following the safety measures during this pandemic period. They provided almost all of our requirements during our stay. We would specially like to thank Ms. Shashika Amarasinghe and her team on the 6th floor for their excellent service.

name: R√ºksh√†√± J
title: Supportive staff
review: We had our wedding at this Beautiful hotel and it was truly a day to remember and we stayed the night and had an amazing breakfast. The staff member who was at the Reception, i think his name was Asanka helped us in every issue we had. No matter what kind of issue you have the staff is always ready to provide a solution. It was hassle free for me and my wife. Thanks Taj Samudra for the amazing customer service.

name: Nishika R
title: Dinner buffet
review: Dinner at PORTS OF CALL Restaurant at taj, the food was out of this world. Rana, Waran, Chathura, Dilhara and Theekshana were a great sport at the floor. We were simply amazed by their personal effort to serve us the best experience ever!! Hope to visit this place soon

name: Daham R
title: Dinner buffet
review: Good food and excellent service Keep it up .wel done.good package.woooowwww entrance and we had a good Dinner today with my friends the service is excellent and staff support also excellent and staff member dilhara gave us a good service on selecting food Thank you so much Taj samudra

name: Huda S
title: Dinner buffet
review: The staff and hospitality is what I love here The food is very nice The restaurant I visited was Ports of call restaurant Team Dilhara Jagath Athauda Amila Mr charity We‚Äôre so kind to host us and serve . Will come back

review: Ports of Call Restaurant is a great place for celebrations!! Went there for a birthday celebration and the staff were so friendly and welcoming. Pleasant and very attentive to our needs. Excellent service provided by the team especially by Dilhara, Sampath, Wasala, Dias, Bandara, Chaminda and Warren. Thank you very much.

name: Jeffrey Bahar
title: Ports Of Call
review: The Food was @ 90% Flavour, Taste, Quality rated this at this level for the soups, salads, indian dishes the prawn buriyani oh my goodness by the great indian chef from which city I cannot remember because all the food and flavours were too good, thank you to you too, the main men and women to perfect the already perfected location, rice and curry, rice, pasta and battered prawns cuttle fish and fish was also too good, desserts were all good. To make the sevice to the best we had Captain Buddhika who did such an excellent job, he was soo quick and accurate to attend made me feel as if I have gone to a 7 Star, all the staff including the Manager was great.. The restaurant was very clean All I can say is just go, ask for Buddhika and just loosen your seat belts as your in

name: Shamalka H
title: Dinner buffet
review: Excellent service at 'ports of restaurant' by Dilhara, Gayan, Uddika, Tithila, Dias, Ruwan, Ranaraja. A warm welcome by them and they accommodated our family very well as there were small kids as well. Great food and fantastic people.

name: Themiya C
title: Dinner buffet
review: The food and drinks were amazing. The Taj hospitality was up to the global standards. Special thank you goes out to Dilhara, Samapth,Wasala, Dias, Banadra,Chamindu and Warren. Will definitely come again and recommend

name: Tharindu Ranathunga
title: Extremely Good Customer Service
review: Dilhara at Port of Call was extremely good to us during our dinner buffet and was quick to respond to anything and everything we needed. He made it a memorable experience by giving us a compliment and made our night, and he even took our picture. Also, would like to to Thank the Taj Team who made a birthday cake for me and delivered at 12 midnight to our room, and also for the lovely hand made birthday card that was given to me by a friendly staff member the following day.

name: Roshani F
title: Extremely good service and friendly staff
review: Visited Ports of the call restaurant with family for dinner. Extremely friendly staff;Dilhara, Uddika, Amila, Lasitha, Thikshana, Ruwan, Charitha who are willing to go an extra mile to assist the customers. Good food and a wide variety to choose with.... The barbeque was the key.

name: Navoda
title: Dinner Buffet
review: Port's of call restaurant dilhara amila Buddhika lasitha ruwan theekshana and charitha Had a nice time with delicious food in a calm environment. Staff was really friendly and good service. Recommended for good food.

name: Ruchira J
title: Dinner Buffet
review: Such delicious food at Port‚Äôs of call restaurant. Amazing service by the entire team including Dilhara, Amila, Uddika, Lasitha, Thikshana, Ruwan and the manager, Charitha. Great variety of food including multiple cuisines.

name: Rebecca Jayakody
title: Dinner buffet
review: Had an excellent time with my family at Ports of call. They had an excellent spread in the dinner buffet plus there was a BBQ night going on. Food was of excellent quality the staff was super friendly and nice! Special thanks to the staff members Mr.Dilhara, Mr.Uddika, Mr.Amila, Mr. Lasitha, Mr. Thikshana, Mr. Ruwan and Mr. Charitha for thier excellent service. Definitely will visit again!

name: Thushan Amarasuriya
title: Avurudhu Holiday With Family
review: We came to Taj to take a break during these holidays, chose Taj Colombo as we didn't want to travel long distance. The experience from the reservation call taken by Andrea , check in experience, in room dining to the restaurants was excellent and truly a 5 star experience. With three young kids around us, Dilhara, Dileka and Nilanka at "ports of call " restaurant was so helpful and they were so patient and courteous with the constant needs of the kids, the food was very tasty as well. Thank you staff and management of Taj all the best to you during these tough times with the pandemic. We definitely want to return to Taj Samudra.

name: Deborah M
title: Looking good
review: Lovely hotel. They have nice restaurants. Specially Navratna Indian restaurant is good. The food is really good. Staffs are great. They have good tasty Indian dishes. Love the thanduri chicken, briyani and butter naan. So yummy. Opposite this hotel Galle face just you can walk to get the nice sea breeze üôÇüëå

Covid precautions were diligently maintained and optimum standards of hygiene was maintained through out the hotel and all restaurants. Highly recommend the Hotel as a suitable choice of venue for official or holiday or recreational purposes..

name: Shani
title: Dinner Buffet
review: On 7th of April, we visited Ports of call restaurant to celebrate our friends 10th year anniversary. The food was awesome and the service was excellent. Sikh ara, Gayan, Thithila, Dias, Chaminda and Warren served us well and it was one of the best services! They provided us with everything we needed without us even asking. They were well synced with the customers requirements!

name: Shamal Ketimingama

name: Ruguna
title: PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS PLACE.
review: Together with booking.com they offer categories of rooms, which dont exist. We paid for a ‚ÄûTaj Club Room‚Äú. As per the description, it comes with all sorts of extra services. Access to an exclusive lounge serving hot & cold drinks all through the day, cocktails served in the evening with snacks, ironing service and many more. Funny enough most of the staff are not aware of this. The lady at guest services told us twice that the cocktail hour takes places between 6-7pm every day in the lounge. Only after addressing the duty manager we found out we had been scammed by the hotel and booking.com together. All those additional services had been suspended for more than a year already. Most other higher end hotels have very transparent informations about reduced services so you can be

name: Nethmi W

review: First of all, i would like to say about their excellent hospitality. The Managers, F&B servers they were very comfortable and helpful. They were in touch from the time we started the buffet. All thanks to Dilhara at port of call. Therfore i recommend anyone who is looking for family dinner buffet. The place is also very calming and beautiful. Thankyou for the Port of call Team and specially Dilhara for organising the cake. It was the way i told you to do it.

name: melanie e

name: Marino D

They did an excellent job in always checking on us and being very kind, professional and a very caring team. They also suggested to have Naan, and other items specially made and offered to the table as well.. delicious food, not as extensive as other buffets but all items on the buffet were Superb ! All in all, a wonderful experience. A great place to have a peaceful dinner and a beautiful surrounding.Thank you to a wonderful job by the entire

To RM - sumedha Dilhara, chathura, amila, wasala, lasitha, ranjala & warren.

name: Ridmi D

She took care of our check in, which was hence extremely smooth and hassle free, and kept checking in on our experience throughout our stay which made us feel truly valued as guests at the hotel. The ports of call restaurant was wonderful and an easy recommendation for anyone looking to enjoy a buffet which exceeds expectations. Although ports of call was booked up for the night, we never experienced a lack of service and experienced prompt

name: HK
title: Dinner buffet at Ports of Call
review: The food was awesome, and there was a good spread in the buffet. The salad bar and the desserts were the best for me personally. Dilhara and the team who served us were very friendly and helpful. The seating and the ambience were nice as well. Will definitely visit again.

name: Seneeth P
title: Dinner Buffet
review: Ports of call Restaurant Dilhara, Chathura,Amila, Lasitha, Wasala, Ranaraja, Warren and Thikshana have served us very well. Will recommend this to everyone. The buffet had a wide spread with meat and veg options.

name: Pahan Rathnayake
title: Dinner buffet
review: The food were amazing. The location was really awesome. Safety regulations were really good.Great service by Dilhara, Chathura, Amila, Lasitha, Wasala, Ranaraja and Warren. Good place for family dinner.

name: Supun L
title: Yumi Japanese restaurant in Taj Samudra Colombo
review: There are many Japanese food experiences to be had in Colombo but non compares with the dining experience afforded at Yumi in Taj Samudra Hotel. Hardly possible to mention the fare.... every dish is a treat. And with excellent staff to cater to every culinary need. Deserving of special mention is Manjula whose attentive and friendly service added to the excellence of the luncheon.

name: Jenny K
title: Dinner at Yumi
review: Was there for a Japanese dinner at Taj's Yumi restaurant. Was highly impressed with the level of cleanliness and beauty at the hotel as well as the restaurant. Courteous staff, no fake smiles. They staff looked like they were doing their job religiously. The soothing decor and lighting brought a nice feel to the evening. Management deserves credit for the job well done.

name: Balasooriya
title: Dinner buffet at the Ports Of Call restaurant
review: Visited on the 8th of March 2021 for a dinner buffet to celebrate my daughter's birthday, and it was great! The hotel staff adhered properly to the current pandemic safety regulations, which made me and my family feel safe about having dinner there. The food was top-notch and there was a wide variety for us to choose from. I especially enjoyed the soups, the main course and desserts as well. Since it was women's day, we got a beautifully made complimentary cupcake as well. The staff was very attentive and helped a lot with my daughter's birthday celebration. I would definitely visit again and recommend the restaurant to others. Special thanks to Dilhara, Amila, Athauda, Lasitha, Ranaraja and Warren for the excellent service!

name: Kavisha S
title: Dinner Buffet
review: Had a great dinner at the ports of call restaurant dinner buffet. Excellent service by restaurant staff. Thank you Dilhara, Amila, Athauda, lasitha, Ranaraja and warren at ports of call for the wonderful service.

name: Anusha J

name: Gangulee
title: High tea
review: The staff was very friendly and attentive. We went for the high tea to celebrate a birthday and Malaka and the team was very supportive in arranging a small surprise. Thanks alot to the hotel and the team.

name: Janith K

Everything was perfect , surely will be returing to the hotel

name: Kasun M
title: High tea

name: tania4185
title: Ports of call
review: I am a self proclaimed breakfast person. I enjoyed the breakfast spread at Ports of Call and the ambience. The staff were very attentive and they made sure my needs were met even before I realized my need! Excellent coffee by Dilhara kick started my day. They also made a pack to take with me so that I could feed my infant back in the room. ( we swap breakfast times when we are traveling with the baby). Great hospitality Dilhara, Chaminda, Ravindu , Nilanka and the team! Would come back for sure and stop over for breakfast when ever possible.

name: Romel M
title: Review for Hightea
review: The Taj High Tea was a buffet at the time I visited! It was a mix of savory and sweets! It triggers your taste buds! Worth the price! I also liked the structure of the hotel, which was very homely structure. During the period I visited I liked the Christmas Decos which was very eye catchy. üòçüòçüëåüëç

name: ‚Äî-ZZV
title: Chinese restaurant @ Taj Samudra
review: The service was truly admirable. The staff ( Kasan, Eranda & Danashka ) made all the effort to make our family have a wonderful dining experience! I enjoyed the tea and was even given a sample to take home! The name of the tea brand was also kindly given to me upon request. The portions were good. The ambiance was a blend of contemporary Chinese design. The personalised experience was truly amazing as they catered to our preferences and altered the dishes to make them anti - allergenic. Thank you Taj Samudra! Best Regards, A grateful and happy customer.

name: Shanaka
title: Dinner Buffet
review: It was a nice visit out there for a dinner. The team including Gayan, Jagath, Wasala, Ruwan, Chaminda, Ranaraja, Thithila and specially Dilhara at Ports of Call Restaurant was very helpful and generous. The food was delicious and had a wide variety too. Its worth the money we spent.

name: Dewmi W
title: Great dinner experience
review: We had a great evening at "Ports of Call Restaurant ",thanks to the team- Paul,Gayan,Lasitha,Thikshana and Warren,led by Dilhara. They got to know it was my dad's birthday and surprised him with a personal cake. They were such a thoughtful and supportive team and the food was absolutely delicious. Thankyou so much for making our evening a special one.

name: Dilshani T
title: Great service at Ports of Call
review: It was a very pleasant evening for our family at Ports of Call restaurant, Taj Colombo . Their food was very good and the service was excellent. We received a friendly service by the team ( Warren, Thikshana, Paul and few others ) led by Dilhara. They were very thoughtful and I was really impressed by the way they treated my little kid by helping to serve and by bringing whatever she needed to the table. Out of all during this covid pandemic period while adhering to all the guidelines provided by the authorities gave us the freedom to self serve providing gloves. Thank you everyone for making our evening a memorable one.

name: Devika Ratnasiri
title: Visit to Taj, Colombo
review: I was at the Golden Dragon in Taj with friends on the 23rd February celebrating my birthday. 1. It was Extremely safe during this corona period. 2. Golden dragon staff was very courteous and helpful. The Waiter on us , a gentleman called Wijitha was excellent. 3. Food was delicious and all of us enjoyed the food thoroughly thanks to the chef who prepared it for us. 4. We all agreed that we should go there on other days too as overall it was a super ambience atmosphere. I recommend whoever who reads this to try it at least once, you‚Äôd LOVE it.

name: Ekna
title: Lunch at Golden Dragon
review: Delicious Food, Every time i Have visited Golden Dragon. Service is Exceptional, as they are around all the time to serve us. Keep up the good service Lasantha, Vijitha and Wajeera. Jasmine Green Tea was refreshing.

name: Ayodhya S

name: Gihani

name: Rangeesh J

review: Wonderful food and great ambiance. Portions of the food are also good. Yangzhou fried rice is good. Condiments are also good. Lamb dish is my favourite. Jasmine green tea was refreshing.Service from Lasantha is awesome!!!

name: F. A. Shafeek
title: Dinner at the Port's of Call Restaurant
review: My family and I visited the Port's of Call restaurant for an International Buffet. There we were given an excellent service by Dilhara and his team members: Lasitha, Paul, Amila, Ranaraja and Warren. The food was simply excellent and with a massive range of perfect combinations. Every dish tasted had a wonderful taste and unique flavour. It was also very pleasing to see that they maintain all the covid-19 guidelines at all times. We were all so very satisfied with the food and the service provided. Looking forward to another visit.üëçüòä

name: poornima m
title: Dinner buffet
review: ‚ÄúPort of call Restaurant ‚Äú Excellent place to have dinner with a family The ambience was great and good service by Dilhara. Would highly recommend this space to anyone that wants to wind down after a busy day of work.

name: Eileen C
title: Sunday brunch
review: For a place that was socially distancing they put us on a cramped table for six. One of us was in a wheelchair which took up space. People were able to help themselves to food which in this climate not good. We came for the bubbles brunch but they only offered sweet sparkling wine. Quality and selection of food has gone down drastically. We did get a cheap still wine alternative, not consistent with a 5* hotel. Waiters did their best but very disappointed in quality and selection of food. This used to be the best in Colombo. No longer I'm afraid.

name: Sharmi
title: High Tea
review: Malaka & Team, Thank you for the great experience.. Friendly staff and lovely ambience.. Food was delicious! Will definitely visit again! A lovely way to spend a sunday with friends and family!!!!!!!!

name: Lahiru H
title: Valentine lunch at GD
review: The ambience was great and good service by Lasantha. Would highly recommend this space to anyone that wants to wind down after a busy day of work. Tried lunch on a Sunday afternoon and the food was great!

name: Davis
title: Excellent Food and Service
review: Came to Taj after a very long time for our wedding anniversary and I was not disappointed. The service was extremely good and the food too. Specially Kasun, one of the friendly waiters. Ill definitely come again. Keep it up.

name: Udeshika P
title: High Tea Buffet
review: Had a nice experience at the high tea buffet.Everything we tasted was delicious.Excellent service from Malaka and the team, they were friendly and efficient.Ambience was pleasant.It was an awesome experience!

name: Chathumi D
title: High tea at the lattice
review: Had a very nice high tea buffet. Very reasonable price. The staff was really friendly. Was served by Mr. Malaka. Food and coffee was good. A variety of sweet and savouries were available. Very nice ambience.

name: Anjana J
title: High tea at Lattice
review: Had the high tea buffet. Was a very reasonable price. Had both savory and sweets on the menu. Food and coffee was excellent. Very friendly staff. Everyone adhered to Covid safety protocols to handle food hygienically. Was served by Mr. Malaka. Highly recommended.

name: Ashan
title: Best chinese restaurant !
review: I had a wonderful experience at the Golden dragon. Every staff member I encountered, from the valet to the check- in to the cleaning staff were delightful and eager to help! Special thanks to Mr. Kasun who served us sincerely. Thank you! Will recommend to my colleagues!

name: Annie A
title: Mothers birthday
review: Excellent service by Kasun and Lasantha. Very helpful and a job well done. Food was excellent and they were very helpful to assist is selecting. They were very willing to arrange a cake to celebrate my mothers as well by arranging a cake

name: Jerome A
title: Delicious Dining Experience
review: We were warmly welcomed by the Golden Dragon Restaurent staff. From the time we entered and exited the Restaurent , it was all good service. Food was delicious , thanks to the waiters Kasun and Lasantha who provided us with a excellent service. Highly recommended and will definitely return!!!

name: FrequentFlier555309
title: Safe, hygienic and the yummiest food
review: We visited taj Samudra‚Äôs golden dragon restaurant for our anniversary dinner and enjoyed its ambiance, tasty food and hygienic conditions Hospitality is commendable and the friendly servers Lasantha and Kasun made sure we were enjoying our time while enjoying the great meal Recommend the chili lamb with sticky rice , it was out of this world!

name: Yohombu
title: Dinner
review: Service by Lasantha and Kasun. We had a great evening at Golden Dragon restaurant & food was delicious. Ambience was superb & the service was excellent. Ambience is eco friendly Hope to come back again.

name: Donald G
title: Lunch
review: Service by Lasantha and Kasun personally attended wonderful service The lunch we ordered was delicious A very peaceful ambiance with soothing music Will want to come again with friends and family Hope this service would continue

name: Chanduli Rubasinghe
title: Dinner Buffet
review: It was a fabulous dining experience at the ports of call restaurant. The spread was amazing, loved the variety of the food! Dilhara, Paul, Uddika, Dias, Ravindu, Warren and Chaminda made our dinner extra special with their amazing service.

name: Sanjay
title: Dinner buffet
review: "Port's of call restaurant" excellent place with great service really worth for money we spent , variety of different foods and pleasant environment made our day !! Recommend to all enjoy delicious foods!!

name: chryshp
title: Restful weekend
review: My husband and I booked into Taj Samudrato enjoy a weekend. We were allowed an early check in and a late check out. We were upgraded to the club floor. The room had the sea view and was very comfortable and spacious. The housekeeping staff were very good and special mention of Shashika who regularly checked if we were comfortable and if there was anything we needed. The best was the club lounge which we used to relax and read. It was so peaceful and comfortable. The staff at the ports of call too were very attentive and saw to it that we enjoyed the delicious food at the restaurant. My family always enjoys the good food at Taj. It was a great weekend.

name: tnching
title: Dinner
review: Visited the Golden Dragon restaurant for dinner. The food was delicious and was high value for money. The service was exceptional. Special appreciation to Lasantha and Kasun who were very friendly and helpful. The food was delivered quickly as well. The ambience of the restaurant was very nice. Overall it was a great experience and would visit again.

name: Yadusha
title: Dinner
review: The food was excellent and the staff, kasun and lasatha were extremely friendly and catered to our services immediately! Throughout enjoyed our dinner here:) the ambience at the golden dragon was beautiful!

name: Firzath K
title: Anniversary Dinner
review: Excellent service and we really enjoyed the atmosphere Mr Danushka Lasantha Kasun Food is very delicious and really enjoyed Nice ambiance friendly stuff We definitely tell our friends to come Colombo best Chinese food Thank you so much guys

name: Jtraveller55
title: Good Service and very friendly staff
review: Enjoyed very much our honeymoon stay at taj. All were great starting with the warm welcome. Thanks for the House keeping team Ms. Shashika and Awantha for lovely arrangement at our room. Also a special thanks goes to Dilhara and team(Chathura, Lasitha, Amila, Ravindu, Ranaraja, Waren and Paul)for an amazing dinner and service. Loved the seafood pasta made for us by them. The environment here is calm and quiet. Covid precautions are well maintained.Safe place to stay. Haighly recommend. Thank you all. Haritha & Nishali
